rlpack.algos.base module¶

class rlpack.algos.base.Base(config)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Algorithm base class.

build_algorithm()[source]¶

Build algorithms using prebuilt networks.

build_network()[source]¶

Build tensorflow operations for algorithms.

get_action(obs)[source]¶

Return action according to the observations. :param obs: the observation that could be image or real-number features :return: actions

load_model()[source]¶

Load model from save_path if there exists.

save_model()[source]¶

Save model to save_path.

update(minibatch, update_ratio)[source]¶

Update policy using minibatch samples. :param minibatch: a minibatch of training data :update_ratio: the ratio of current update step in total update step :return: update info, i.e. loss.
